column1: Natural gas was the the largest source of US domestic energy production in 2012.
column2: Fossil fuels domestic energy production dwarved renewable and nuclear production in 2012.
column3: Biomass was the largest source of US domestic renewable energy production in 2012.
column4: In 2012, the US domestically produced more renewable energy than nuclear energy.
column5: In 2012, the top three methods of energy production in the US were all fossil fuels.
column6: In 2012, the US produced more nuclear energy than any individual category of renewable energy.
